    • cure

      public boolean cure​(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, com.ibexmc.epidemic.ailments.Ailment ailment)
      Cures the player of a particular ailment. If the ailment is null, all current ailments will be cured
      Parameters:
      player - Player to cure
      ailment - Ailment to cure (if null, cures all ailments)
      Returns:
      True if cured, false if not (player did not have ailment etc.)
